channel.title: What is the correct procedure after host drops connection?
channel.description:
<Whonix/networking noob> Which steps need to be taken to re-connect everything after host drops connection? Once host connection is re-established and both 'Gateway & 'Workstation are on...
- Do I need to run 'timesync' on both 'Gateway & 'Workstation again? Do 'whonixcheck' again?
- 'Gateway has icons for '[i]Tor Restart[/i]', '[i]Tor Reload[/i]', [i]Reload Firewall[/i]. When do I use those?
Thank You.

item.title: What is the correct procedure after host drops connection?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You don’t need to do anything.

  • Tor reload: after making changes to Tor config
  • Tor restart after making changes to Tor config that don’t work with reload (ports below 1024)
  • Firewall reload: after making firewall changes
